title.rendered: ISRAELI ACTRESS ADI BEN EZRA LEAVES MILITARY CAREER BEHIND FOR HOLLYWOOD STARDOM

content.rendered:
Adi Ben Ezra Courtesy of Espada PR

Jewish Matchmaking now on Netflix

LOS ANGELES, CA, UNITED STATES, May 31, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Adi Ben Ezra, an Israeli actress and former special ops officer, has made the leap from military life to Hollywood with her starring role in the new Netflix series Jewish Matchmaking.

The show follows singles in the United States and Israel as they turn their dating life over to a top Jewish matchmaker.

Ben Ezra, who served and was a Lieutenant in the Israeli military for several years, left behind a promising career in special operations to pursue her passion for acting. Her hard work and dedication have paid off, as she landed a lead role in the new hit series Jewish Matchmaking, which premiered on Netflix this month.

The show has already garnered a loyal following. Fans have been quick to praise her acting skills and on-screen presence, and many are excited to see what she’ll do next. Ben Ezra’s looks often draw comparisons to Hollywood heavyweights Gal Gadot and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

Despite her success on Jewish Matchmaking, Ben Ezra isn’t content to rest on her laurels. She has her sights set on even bigger things, including the chance to work with legendary director Quentin Tarantino.

“I have been acting all my life. Since I was eight years old I’ve been working on short films, commercials and theatre. This is why I took the brave step of leaving my military career behind and follow my dreams in Hollywood” Ben Ezra said.

With her talent and determination, it’s clear that Adi Ben Ezra has a bright future ahead of her in Hollywood. Fans of Jewish Matchmaking and lovers of great acting alike will want to keep an eye on this rising star.

Jewish Matchmaking is now streaming exclusively on Netflix.

##

Jasmin Espada
Espada PR
+1 818-521-3807
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Instagram

News Provided By

May 31, 2023, 19:57 GMT
